name: Driftwalker
description:
Sabotage has left the Driftwalker depressurized and floating in space, luckily most of its crew reached a safe area. Now it's up to Dr. Hal, the only one with a space suit, to figure out what happened and get the rest of the crew to safety.

Art, navigation, and scripting:
Stephen Schroeder
Twitter: @thedeivore

Dialog and scripting:
Stuart Hwang

Music and Audio:
Ryan Levin
